cab.content: Military Secret.1362From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,2lst April 1020.(Received 22nd.)5004. 21st April. Waziristan. Until decision is reached on our Foreign Department telegram No. 332 S., of the 23rd of March, we are compelled, at consider-able expense, to maintain additional force in Waziristan. We therefore request earliest possible reply.
